text: Authentication Strategist defined MFA policy requiring 100% coverage for all users and privileged accounts
Identity Provider API Tool retrieved MFA enrollment data showing 94% coverage with contractors missing
Compliance Framework Tool aligned authentication policy with NIST 800-63 and ISO 27001 standards
Search Tool researched WebAuthn and FIDO2 keys for passwordless authentication adoption
Identity Provider API Tool identified 78% SSO federation coverage with Jira and Zoom pending
IAM Data Extractor found non-federated apps including Notion and Miro requiring SSO integration
SIEM Tool detected 542 failed logins with credential stuffing and impossible travel anomalies
Latency Monitor Tool measured authentication latency with Salesforce at 245ms and Workday at 310ms
MFA Enrollment Tracker identified 5200 enrolled users with 97.3% coverage and 2 non-compliant accounts
Log Analysis Tool correlated credential attacks across regions identifying 1300 credential stuffing attempts
Privileged Account Analytics Tool monitored root_aws and db_admin accounts detecting MFA bypass attempts
Audit Checklist Tool validated authentication controls scoring 91% compliance with findings
Compliance Mapping Tool verified MFA SSO session security and privileged access monitoring
Reporting Dashboard Tool generated executive report showing 98.7% login success rate
Okta identity provider enforced MFA for all users with 96% enrollment completion
Azure AD configured SSO federation for 45 SaaS applications with SAML authentication
Ping Identity platform managed authentication for 5000 users with passwordless WebAuthn support
Keycloak open source identity provider enabled OAuth2 and OpenID Connect for applications
Authelia authentication server enforced two-factor authentication with TOTP codes
FreeIPA identity management system managed 2000 user accounts with LDAP integration
YubiKey hardware tokens deployed for 300 privileged accounts requiring physical authentication
Duo Security MFA platform blocked 23 authentication bypass attempts in last 24 hours
Google Authenticator TOTP app generated time-based codes for 4500 enrolled users
Microsoft Authenticator app enabled passwordless sign-in for 2800 mobile device users
FIDO2 security keys registered for 150 high-privilege accounts requiring phishing-resistant auth
Session management audit found refresh tokens not expiring requiring 8-hour idle timeout
JWT token reuse detected across 12 API endpoints requiring immediate revocation
Stale account review identified 45 inactive accounts and 12 terminated employee accounts
Impossible travel detection flagged login from New York followed by London within 2 hours
Velocity abuse detected with 50 login attempts from single IP address in 5 minutes
Brute force attack detected with 47 failed login attempts targeting admin account
Credential stuffing attack identified 1300 automated login attempts using breached credentials
Authentication incident INC123 escalated to SOC with credential stuffing severity high
MFA bypass attempt detected for privileged account requiring immediate account lockout
Session hijacking prevented by invalidating all active sessions after suspicious activity
Password policy enforcement required 12-character minimum with complexity requirements
Account lockout policy triggered after 5 failed login attempts requiring 30-minute cooldown
Authentication latency SLA compliance achieved 96% with average response time 280ms
SSO federation coverage improved to 85% with 15 applications remaining non-federated
Passwordless authentication adoption reached 35% with WebAuthn and FIDO2 keys
Privileged access monitoring coverage achieved 100% for all admin and service accounts
Authentication false positive rate reduced to 2.1% improving alert accuracy
Stale account remediation completed for 45 inactive accounts within 7-day SLA
Authentication training completion reached 95% for all employees and contractors
